I play games, I’m a programmer, am a proponent of open source. Wish I were more / could be more into contributing to open source software Very liberal, but debatably not liberal enough Liberal meaning “left-leaning” (American Progressive) (apparently these are called “leftists” now? Any other socials will be in “About.” If it’s not there, ask me.
